framework.title: The 4D Framework
framework.description: A mental model for working with AI effectively.

dimensions.name: Delegation
dimensions.question: What should AI handle?
dimensions.description: Identify tasks where AI adds value — repetitive admin work, drafting, formatting, research. Keep human judgment for decisions that matter.

dimensions.name: Description
dimensions.question: How do I tell it what I need?
dimensions.description: Good prompts have context, specifics, and format. Think of it as briefing a smart colleague — the more context you give, the better the output.

dimensions.name: Discernment
dimensions.question: Is the output good enough?
dimensions.description: AI output is a first draft, not a final product. Read it critically. Check facts. Adjust tone. You're the editor, not the audience.

dimensions.name: Diligence
dimensions.question: Am I using this responsibly?
dimensions.description: Know the boundaries. Protect client data. Review before sharing externally. When in doubt, check the traffic light card.
